description: HIV, Human Development and Mobility in Asia and the Pacific – Phase II

subproject.description: The Regional programme will focus on creating an enabling environment for reducing the vulnerabilities of people to HIV and promoting safe mobility.  Regional and inter-country capacity of key stakeholders will be developed to respond to the human development, governance, human rights, and gender challenges of HIV/AIDS, mobility and trafficking in the region.  In the context of regional efforts to promote the achievement of MDGs, the regional programme will build capacity for costing and developing comprehensive, multi-sectoral responses.  The regional project will work in close partnership with the UNAIDS family, inter-regional bodies, their member governments.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Asia  Pacific HIV HD & Mobilit
